name: Frndzk Photo Lightbox Gallery
author: Bitto Kazi

sections.description:
Frndzk photo lightbox plugin adds lightbox effect to all photos of every post and pages. it also shows photos in a group of a post like a photo album. it has next and previous to navigate photos. Just install the plugin and see your photos! no setup or configuration needed. demo plugin developed by bitto kazi

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘frndzkpg.zip’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory and extract the zip file
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

for questions please write here
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • First version

1.1

  • Updated fixed url for loading and close image. now works any url.
